SELECT a.summary, a.message_type, a.target_id, b.id AS message_id, b.user_id, d.user_id AS send_user_id, d.target_time, d.greetting, b.is_read, b.created, c.content, c.reply, c.is_reply, e.remark, e.id AS friend_id, e.relationship, f.nickname, f.avatar FROM app_message a LEFT JOIN app_message_user b ON b.app_message_id = a.id LEFT JOIN gift_record_detail c ON c.id = a.target_id LEFT JOIN gift_record d ON d.id = c.gift_record_id LEFT JOIN friend e ON e.user_id = #{userId} AND e.friend_user_id = d.user_id LEFT JOIN app_user f ON f.id = d.user_id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} AND a.message_type = 1 ORDER BY b.id DESC

SELECT b.summary, b.message_type, b.target_id, a.id AS message_id, e.price, e.title, e.description, e.cover, e.description, a.created FROM app_message_user a LEFT JOIN app_message b ON a.app_message_id = b.id LEFT JOIN consignment_order c ON c.id = b.target_id LEFT JOIN consignment d ON c.consignment_id = d.id LEFT JOIN v_bp e ON e.id = d.bp_id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND b.message_type = 3 ORDER BY a.id DESC

select a.id, a.summary, a.title, a.content, a.target_id, a.target_type, a.message_type, a.created, b.user_id, b.is_read, null as avatar, null as friend_user_id FROM app_message a LEFT JOIN app_message_user b on a.id = b.app_message_id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} AND a.message_type = 2 and a.target_type != 24 and a.target_type != 25 union select a.id, a.summary, a.title, a.content, a.target_id, a.target_type, a.message_type, a.created, b.user_id, b.is_read, d.avatar, d.id as friend_user_id FROM app_message a LEFT JOIN app_message_user b on a.id = b.app_message_id left join gift_record_detail c on a.target_id = c.id left join app_user d on c.user_id = d.id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} AND a.message_type = 2 and a.target_type = 24 union select a.id, a.summary, a.title, a.content, a.target_id, a.target_type, a.message_type, a.created, b.user_id, b.is_read, d.avatar, d.id as friend_user_id FROM app_message a LEFT JOIN app_message_user b on a.id = b.app_message_id left join for_record c on a.target_id = c.id left join app_user d on c.user_id = d.id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} AND a.message_type = 2 and a.target_type = 25 order by created DESC
